name: Blackriver Trucks Wide 2.0 29mm Black Jack
description: The first professional fingerboard trucks are ready with a few nice innovations. The trucks are now available in different color combinations. Just like we know it from colored skateboard trucks these fingerboard trucks will show the wanted 'used look' just like the real ones would. The 2.0 Blackriver trucks feature brand new locking nuts (do not overtighten!) as well. You also get the new BR tool and keychain... A huge step up from the generic toy tools. The BRR trucks pack contains: - 1 pair of BRR trucks incl. Special locking nuts - 8 mounting screws - 1 improved BRR Tool The trucks are optimized to fit BRR edition wheels from different brands (We recommend Winkler Wheels BRR edition). Most other Wheel types will also fit but due to missing standards not every wheel types will fit. ─────────────────── Brand – Blackriver Trucks Condition – NEW Age Range – Suitable for Age 14+ Warning! Choking Hazard – Contains Small Parts.
